titles.title: Transparency in Cybersecurity Initiatives for Small Contractors Act of 2021
Transparency in Cybersecurity Initiatives for Small Contractors Act of 2021

To require the Secretary of Defense to report to Congress on the effects on small businesses of the Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification framework of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Transparency in Cybersecurity Initiatives for Small Contractors Act of 2021
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on the effects of the Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification framework on small business concerns.
